title: Clarifying Values in Islamic Religious Education: Project-Based Learning Model Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Islamic doctrinal concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A group of students from diverse cultural backgrounds, familiar with digital environments but facing challenges in applying religious values

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define Islamic core values (justice, moderation, respect, etc.) and explain them in their own words
Learners can implement decision-making processes that apply Islamic values to real-world scenarios through project-based assignments
Learners can logically communicate the rationale behind their value choices during peer feedback processes using digital platforms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
